1110400.name: TS Marketplace: Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack
1110400.description:
Bring your railroads to life with this Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads. This freight wagon is designed for carrying heavy loads across German railroads, with a protective tarpaulin cover on its frame to keep goods safe during transport. Recreated for Train Simulator Classic this wagon pack includes five different designs including DB Schenker and Railion. There is also a RandomSkin feature included along with dynamic numbering for ease of use when adding to your scenarios.

Key Features


  • Authentic Shimmns-ttu wagon model
  • 5 unique designs (Featuring DB, DB Schenker, Railion, VRot)
  • Random skin option
  • Automatic end plates and dynamic number system
